examples: rooms with closed doors lined the hallway

definitions.definition: (of a business) having ceased trading, especially for a short period.
examples: he put the “Closed” sign up on the door

definitions.definition: (of a society or system) not communicating with or influenced by others; independent.
limited to certain people; not open or available to all.
examples: the UN Security Council met in closed session
you're facing the situation with a closed mind

definitions.definition: (of a set) having the property that the result of a specified operation on any element of the set is itself a member of the set.
(of a set) containing all its limit points.
of or pertaining to a curve whose ends are joined.
